price: 44. Aabbow! Ha caabudin (ha adeecin) shaydaan. Xaqiiq, Shaydaanku waa mid abad Raxmaanka ku caasi ah.
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāabati lā taʿbudi al-shayṭāna inna al-shayṭāna kāna lilrraḥmāni ʿaṣiyyan
